cab.content: 25771J Front Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, 1692 9tk February 1921. (Received 10th, 8 a.m.) Priority A. 184 S. Afghanistan. Following from Dobbs, 34 0, dated 8th February : " Very secret. Jamal telegraphed 30th January. Enver, through Afghans,enquiring whether it is true, as published, that Armenia has issued an ultimatum toMustafa Kemal, demanding restitution of Kars, whether there is dissension betweenTurks and Russians. He adds a warning that Russia will ruin Turkey. I suggestthat possibility of dissension over Armenia be emphasized in Press as much aspossible." Stfeps will be taken to influence Indian Press accordingly.
